synopsis.text: Never Fear, the captivating ending theme of the anime Ningen Fushin: Adventurers Who Donâ€™t Believe in Humanity Will Save the World, is brought to life in its official music video. The song, performed by the talented Mao Abe, perfectly encapsulates the spirit of the anime, leaving viewers eager for more. As the closing credits roll, fans are treated to a musical journey that beautifully complements the series' unique narrative. Don't miss out on this enthralling anime and its unforgettable ending theme!
